sheetClassifications.description: This sheet provides a detailed account of the manufacturing costs for the year ended 31st Dec 2024. It includes information on raw material costs.
sheetClassifications.suggestedUse: This data can be used to calculate the cost of goods sold, which is necessary for determining gross profit on the income statement for tax purposes.
sheetClassifications.reasoning: The sheet name and the headers in the data suggest that this is a Manufacturing Account. The data appears to be organized and relevant to the category.

sheetClassifications.description: This sheet provides a detailed account of the company's trading and profit & loss for the month ended 31st Dec 2024. It includes information on sales.
sheetClassifications.suggestedUse: This data can be used to calculate net profit or loss, which is necessary for income tax calculation.
sheetClassifications.reasoning: The sheet name and the headers in the data suggest that this is a Profit & Loss account. The data appears to be organized and relevant to the category.

sheetClassifications.description: This sheet provides a snapshot of the company's financial position as at 31st Dec 2024. It includes information on assets, liabilities, and equity.
sheetClassifications.suggestedUse: This data can be used to assess the company's financial health and is necessary for corporate tax filing.
sheetClassifications.reasoning: The sheet name and the headers in the data suggest that this is a Balance Sheet. The data appears to be organized and relevant to the category.
